mapper.select: select id, name, level,visible from view_category
select id, name,leftv, rightv, visible from category where name = #{name}
select id, name, visible from category where id = #{id}
select id, name from category where leftv > #{leftv} and rightv < #{rightv}
mapper.update: update category set leftv=leftv+2 where leftv > #{rightv}
update category set rightv=rightv+2 where rightv>=#{rightv}
mapper.delete: delete from category where leftv between #{leftv} and #{rightv}
mapper.update: update category set leftv=leftv-#{length} where leftv>#{leftv}
update category set rightv=rightv-#{length} where rightv>#{rightv}
